name: IUPHAR/BPS Guide to PHARMACOLOGY
description: The IUPHAR/BPS Guide to PHARMACOLOGY is an expert-driven guide to pharmacological targets with quantitative information on the prescription medicines and experimental dugs that act on them. Developed as a joint initiative of the International Union of Basic and Clinical Pharmacology (IUPHAR) and the British Pharmacological Society (BPS) and is now the new home of the IUPHAR Database (IUPHAR-DB).
keywords: protein, target, ligand, drug, pharmacology, curated database

dataset.name: IUPHAR/BPS Guide to PHARMACOLOGY database
dataset.description: An expert-curated database of pharmacological targets with quantitative information on the prescription medicines and experimental dugs that act on them.

sourceOrganization.name: The International Union of Basic and Clinical Pharmacology

provider.name: The International Union of Basic and Clinical Pharmacology

publication.name: The IUPHAR/BPS Guide to PHARMACOLOGY in 2016: towards curated quantitative interactions between 1300 protein targets and 6000 ligands
